author: tabish
msg: Fixes a memory leak and corrects the way in which transports are created when inside the Failover Transport.  Cleans up the Pointer class some more and adds some more test cases.

msg: CAMEL-1452,CAMEL-1387: Added IsSingleton to allow Injector to return shared instances. Added methods for tooling on CamelContext.
